v.
Olentangy Local School Dist. Bd. of Edn. 2017-1160 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 30, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

Certified Question of State Law, United States District Court, Southern District of Ohio, Eastern Division, No. 2:16-CV-837. On joint application for dismissal. Application granted. Cause dismissed.
